allow:
Bash(powershell -File - <<'PSEOF'
$word = New-Object -ComObject Word.Application
$word.Visible = $false

$files = @\(
    'C:\\Users\\DevanshGoel\\Downloads\\Letter_Head_KKG_Purchase_Order_20251106_JHEEVA_2.docx',
    'C:\\Users\\DevanshGoel\\Downloads\\Letter_Head_KKG_Purchase_Order_20251215_SKY.docx',
    'C:\\Users\\DevanshGoel\\Downloads\\Letter_Head_KKG_Purchase_Order_20251107_MADURAI_2.docx',
    'C:\\Users\\DevanshGoel\\Downloads\\Letter_Head_KKG_Purchase_Order_20260107_MAHESH.docx'
\)

foreach \($f in $files\) {
    Write-Output "===== FILE: $f ====="
    $doc = $word.Documents.Open\($f\)
    Write-Output $doc.Content.Text
    $doc.Close\($false\)
    Write-Output ""
}

$word.Quit\(\)
PSEOF)
